Hi! I'm Naomi and I'm very excited to show you the world's greatest attractions.
Called the first wonder of the world, China's Stone Forest spans 96,000 acres.
Ancient rock formations, about 270 million years old, dominate the landscape.
Many legends surround the different shapes and arrangements of the forest.
The stones resemble an unimaginable variety of humans, animals and trees.
The phenomenon can also be observed underground and within several lakes.
Visitors hold festivals and pay tribute to the mythology of this natural wonder.
Thank you for watching our travel video series.
